body:
Hello everyone, My name is Mario aka AbusiveUser so I'm doing this AMA because I'm bored and it's my birthday so yeah go ahead and ask me some questions! I will try to be very honest with you. I'm going to answer some questions in Spanish too.

Probably I won't answer some questions (depends). Have fun!!
body_tagged:
Hello everyone, My name is Mario aka AbusiveUser so I'm doing this AMA because I'm bored and it's my birthday so yeah go ahead and ask me some questions! I will try to be very honest with you. I'm going to answer some questions in Spanish too.

Probably I won't answer some questions (depends). Have fun!!

{tag=1c898c77b0cc474a8ce4b5521f2b18e7},

You are a really good person, I'm really glad you got promoted to Junior Moderator! and also is good that you live in the same city as me, I will meet you very soon xd and you are pretty good at PvP, thanks for everything dude! 

{tag=309bd365f87b4077b5621aebdc7d3db3},

Pepperoni and Mexican pizza

My favourite color is Black and Dark Blue!

I haven't talk to you yet, but someone told me you are a great person! we should talk one day :)

{tag=6248019ce74a42a4bf4b9cf1c189a72d},

Color - Black and Dark Blue

You are a really good boi and good penguin. I really enjoy talk with you, and also the music you suggested yesterday was pretty nice :v

{tag=99522edd5edf40658861f7e280b7ff09},

No, aún no me llega la PC. Sigo utilizando la pc de mi mamá xD

Eres una persona genial, un poco seria cuando hacemos el map making pero se que tienes un lado divertido xD, eres muy bueno en PvP y espero verte en lo más alto de Avicus.

replies.body:
{tag=bff56e079469477281be84fc627ea113},

Hey, you are a really good moderator and person. We haven't talk so I really want to be talk with you!
As a player you are good at pvp but if you practice you will be better.

Better= We work really good as a team right now ;)
Worse= Organization

{tag=99b8a2a4cb224ba1a6837cd90a02aac5},

You are a really good guy, excellent moderator. I won't lie but you are really weird and you make some bad jokes :v. You showed me a lot of things to be better at my job and I really appreciate it. You fix my grammar errors and that's also good. I really like to talk in Slack when I'm in bed :v, thanks again boi. You are my best friend here :heart:

Ahhhh, crush? uhmm.. I don't know.. Aaa :v I think my IGN answer your question :v

Wombats!!!

When I got promoted to Junior, when I won my first scrimmage with Emoji xD and when Pie make a joke about a bottle ! LOL (xuphhhh)

{tag=c46b2f456c394346827579c37faa1a03},

Eres una persona muy alegre y muy carismática, me encanta hablar contigo en TS. Me encanta jugar Minecraft contigo por que eres muyy bueno (Gold IV :3).
Luego te digo mas en privado papuu <3

Eres una persona muy alegre y muy carismática, me encanta hablar contigo en TS. Me encanta jugar Minecraft contigo por que eres muyy bueno (Gold IV :3).
Luego te digo mas en privado papuu <3

replies.body:
Gracias!

Pienso que eres una persona muy madura cuando tienes que serlo. Tienes mucha creatividad cuando creas mapas y pienso que eso te podria llevar muy lejos (como lograr ser Builder). Eres un jugador regular en PvP pero eso se puede solucionar con practica.
Me gustaría volver hablar contigo pero aún no tienes micro :(

replies.body:
You are a really really good friend, we talked a few times so I would like to talk more. I still remember the day when you were singing songs of Barbie and getting triggered in TeamSpeak (I have a video of it LOL).
You are really good moderator and mentor, kinda inactive but pretty gud. I don't know your skills in PvP but I will assume you are good (we should 1v1 some day). Thanks for eveything Jess♥

Animation

Join to Animation School in Mexico
Travel to Canada and Colombia
Get a better job LOL
Go to Super Bowl 2017

replies.body:
{tag=fb57ed989f4140c78e61dee46d34d427},

I wanted a original username, so I decided to use AbusiveUser because I like it.
I'm not an abuser tho xD

You are a great Moderator, you deserved it! We haven't talk in TeamSpeak yet so I can't give you an opinion about yourself but as I said, you are good at Moderating, you need to improve some minor things but keep going!

{tag=5e1794b848e14df49f26bc42e2224e4c},

Gracias, ya veremos. No tuve tiempo para entrar al TS, espero que pronto tenga tiempo.

{tag=db8824c420da41b392b3156562699b69},

Eres buenisimo en PvP pero aveces ouedes der bastante enfadoso xD, eres un buen amigo y me gusta hablar contigo por el acento de los españoles :v

Mira quien habla ;)

Preguntale a Posighdun LOL
